title: Advancement; valuation of
context: §532-11 Advancement; valuation of. The value of any real or personal estate so advanced, shall be deemed to be that, if any, which was acknowledged by the child by an instrument in writing; otherwise, the value shall be estimated according to the worth of the property when given. [CC 1859, §1459; RL 1925, §3312; RL 1935, §4820; RL 1945, §12080; RL 1955, §318-11; HRS §532-11]
